overview: Janelle (Asa Akira) flees in the night from her abusive husband Darren. She relocates a thousand miles away and tries to begin a new life. Nice guy Ben is immediately smitten with the mysterious new barista at his local coffee shop.. After many weeks of trying, Ben convinces Janelle to go out with him and they begin happily dating. Everything finally seems good in Janelle's lifeâ€¦until Darren discovers where she has been hiding and shows up at her apartment. Luckily Ben also shows up just in time.
title: Dark Secrets
